description: Data sent from a MultipurposeSensor to a Spaceheat SCADA. A set of readings made at the same time by a multipurpose sensor, sent by the MultipurposeSensor SpaceheatNode actor to its SCADA. The nth element of each of its three readings (what is getting read, what the value is, what the TelemetryNames are).

LeftRightDot.description: Lowercase alphanumeric words separated by periods, most significant word (on the left) starting with an alphabet character.

ReasonableUnixTimeMs.description: An integer reflecting unix time in ms between midnight Jan 1 2000 and midnight Jan 1 3000 UTC

SpaceheatTelemetryName000.name: spaceheat.telemetry.name.000
SpaceheatTelemetryName000.description: Specifies the name of sensed data reported by a Spaceheat SCADA

oneOf.title: RelayState
oneOf.description: State of a Relay. 0 means open, 1 means closed

oneOf.title: WaterTempCTimes1000
oneOf.description: Water temperature, in Degrees Celcius multiplied by 1000. So 43200 means 43.2 deg C

oneOf.title: WaterTempFTimes1000
oneOf.description: Water temperature, in Degrees F multiplied by 1000. So 142100 means 142.1 deg F

oneOf.title: GpmTimes100
oneOf.description: Gallons Per Minute multiplied by 100. So 433 means 4.33 gallons per minute.

oneOf.title: CurrentRmsMicroAmps
oneOf.description: Current measurement in Root Mean Square MicroAmps

oneOf.title: VoltageRmsMilliVolts
oneOf.description: Voltage in Root Mean Square MilliVolts

oneOf.title: AirTempCTimes1000
oneOf.description: Air temperature, in Degrees Celsius multiplied by 1000.

oneOf.title: AirTempFTimes1000
oneOf.description: Air temperature, in Degrees F multiplied by 1000.

AboutNodeAliasList.title: AboutNodeAliasList
AboutNodeAliasList.description: List of aliases of the SpaceHeat Nodes getting measured

TelemetryNameList.title: TelemetryNameList
TelemetryNameList.description: List of the TelemetryNames. The nth name in this list indicates the TelemetryName of the nth alias in the AboutNodeAliasList.

Axiom1.title: ListLengthConsistency
Axiom1.description: AboutNodeAliasList, ValueList and TelemetryNameList must all have the same length.
